title: Interpretation of the ceiling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the roof in a dream is what is on the roof of the house or building that covers it, isolating a person from those who live on the floors above, and the roof rests on the pillars of the house. The sleeper can see them cracked during his dream or see him falling and dirt falling on his head or water leaking from him, to see The ceiling in a dream is one of the visions that amazes the dreamer. He sees it whenever he looks at it, but when he sees it during his sleep, he does not understand the meaning and purpose of this matter, so we present in the following lines the interpretations of seeing it in a dream, as narrated by dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the ceiling in a dream, says the scholar Muhammad Bin Shirin about seeing the ceiling in a dream with the following interpretations: The ceiling in the dream symbolizes a hidden person. The wooden ceiling suggests a man with an arrogant personality. The ceiling ready to fall means fear of the tyranny of the oppressor. The presence of a crack in the ceiling in the dream indicates that you are worried about illness or poverty. A crack in the side of the ceiling or beam indicates family and marital disputes that the dreamer is experiencing. The falling ceiling in a dream indicates the dreamer’s transition from a state of physical and psychological discomfort to happiness and comfort. The ceiling of the room fell in a dream. Below we report the interpretation of the ceiling of the room falling in a dream according to the situations Different psychological and social meanings for the dreamer: The ceiling in a dream symbolizes the breadwinner of the family, and seeing it falling indicates the financial difficulties experienced by the breadwinner and his family. Dirt or water falling after the ceiling falls, for an unmarried woman in a dream, indicates that her condition and the condition of her family will change for the better. The ceiling In a married woman’s dream, it represents the husband, and his falling in her dream shows her fear and fear of him. Seeing a married woman leaving the house after the ceiling falls in a dream indicates the estrangement that will occur between her and her husband, which will take a long time. Interpretation of a dream about the hall ceiling falling. The ceiling of the prayer hall falling on the dreamer indicates that he is suffering. Of worries and problems as a result of serious disputes between him and his family. The falling ceiling of the hall in a dream indicates the debts that have accumulated on the dreamer, which the dreamer is worried about how to pay them. Interpretation of a dream about the falling ceiling of the kitchen: The kitchen is a woman’s favorite place in her home, and seeing her sleeping has many interpretations, which are: It indicates A falling kitchen ceiling in a dream indicates financial difficulties and the need for money. A falling kitchen ceiling can indicate bad luck, illness, or divorce. Interpretation of a dream about a hole in the ceiling of a house. In the following points we provide an interpretation of seeing a hole in the ceiling of a house: If an unmarried woman dreams of a hole In the ceiling of a room or house, it means that she will do unwanted things, had she known that her father would have brought her to do it. If you see a hole in the ceiling of a house in a dream, this may indicate stress caused by debt, and repairing the hole indicates a great deal of sustenance. And comfort. For an unmarried woman to see a gap in the culture of her home is not a promising vision, as this may indicate that her husband will betray her, and this may indicate difficulty in life and the accumulation of debts, but restoring this void in the dream indicates a change in the world.

title: I dreamed that I had a daughter, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I had a girl. Young girls are among the visions that bode well and are considered among the most beautiful dreams that some people see in a dream. Scientists believe that the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the social status of each person, and in this article we consider together the most important things that the interpreters said about this dream. I dreamed that I had a girl. If the dreamer sees that he has a beautiful little girl in a dream, this means that he will be blessed with many good things, and they will open up to him. Doors to happiness and joy. If the sleeper sees that there is a little girl with dirty clothes and an emaciated body, this indicates that she will face many problems and obstacles in her life. And when the dreamer sees that she is carrying a child who was born in a dream, this means that her circumstances will change for the better and she will begin a new life at her age. If a merchant sees in his dream that he has a baby girl and she looks beautiful, this portends him good luck and huge profits that he will achieve. Also, a man who sees a girl in a dream means that he will occupy the highest positions and receive a reward for his efforts. If the dreamer is troubled and sees in a dream a beautiful girl and her clothes It is fine, it means that God will relieve him of his anxiety and relieve him of the difficult ordeals that he is exposed to. I dreamed that I have a daughter by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees in his dream a beautiful young girl, then he is happy because he is very happy and very happy and that he is the one who comes to him. And when a married woman sees That she has a little girl who is not good-looking and that her clothes are cut off, this means that she will face many worsening problems and crises. When a girl sees that she is giving birth to a girl, this symbolizes the positive changes that will happen to her and she will be happy with all the good events that she will enjoy. If a young man sees a beautiful girl In his dream, he promises him that he will fulfill his desires and achieve everything he desires. The dreamer is a mother who was a businessman and saw a young and beautiful girl in a dream, which means that she will possess a lot of good things and receive a lot of sustenance. I dreamed that I had a daughter and that I was alone. The great scholar son says Sirin: Seeing an unmarried girl as a young girl means that she is on the cusp of a new life filled with many positive changes. If the dreamer sees a young woman in a dream, he gives her good news of a good situation and a bright future full of good news and many blessings. But if the little girl is weak and in a bad condition, this It indicates that she will go through many psychological problems and suffer from a state of extreme sadness and patience. I dreamed that I had a daughter and got married. A married woman who sees a girl in a dream means that she is close to pregnancy and will give birth to a girl, God willing. If a woman sees a girl in a dream and she is good-looking, this means that she will enjoy offspring. Ok, and the doors of goodness will open for her. When the dreamer sees a girl in a dream, but she is wearing dirty clothes and an ugly appearance, this indicates the bad luck that will befall her in those days. But if the woman sees that she has a deformed girl in her hand, and she has some deformities, then this indicates that she is suffering from Many problems and disagreements with her husband. I dreamed that I gave birth to a daughter while I was pregnant. A pregnant woman in the first months

title: Seeing a tattoo on the neck and abdomen in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tattoo on the neck: Seeing a tattoo on the neck indicates a marital relationship. Anyone who sees a tattoo on his neck indicates that there is a fight between the spouses and it will break out. As you can see, removing a tattoo from the neck indicates the end of these problems and reconciliation between them. The meaning of seeing a tattoo on the stomach. Whoever dreams of having a tattoo on his stomach in the shape of a fish, It is a sign of comprehensive nutrition. If the tattoo is a large blue eye, this is a sign of envy for the dreamer. Arm and face tattoos. Whoever sees a tattoo on the body. A predator on the hand indicates fear, panic, and insecurity. Perhaps it indicates the dreamer’s vibration in all aspects of his life. A facial tattoo shows self-confidence and distinction. Dream of a tattoo On the leg and backAny person dreams of having a tattoo on his leg, it symbolizes the dreamer’s search and diligence in obtaining a livelihood of lawful money and moving on to a better life. The back tattoo shows bail if the design is beautiful. If the drawing is in the shape of a mouse, it indicates difficulties and obstacles in the path of the viewer. Meaning Animal tattoos in a dream Drawing a tattoo on the body of pets in a dream indicates kindness and blessings. Although animals are not pets, they indicate problems and fear. Designing insect tattoos of any kind is disliked. As for someone who draws a tattoo in the shape of a bird, it is a sign of nourishment and effort at work. The meaning of a cross tattoo in a dream. Seeing a cross tattoo in a dream for a Muslim on his back is a sign of fatigue and walking alone in life. As for a Christian who dreams of dragging a cross on his back, this is evidence of support and relief from his worries. The problem is over. Seeing a tattoo in a dream according to color. The color of the tattoo. Green. It indicates goodness, blessing, and livelihood. And happy news. What if it was colored? Yellow It is a sign of illness, unhappiness and unhappiness. Interpretation of a dream about a tattoo in a woman’s dream A woman’s vision of a green pet tattoo indicates the fulfillment of her desires and success. Childbearing for a married woman and easy childbirth for a pregnant woman. As for seeing a tattoo of yellow birds of prey, this is clearly exhaustion, sadness and great adversity Add the dream you would like to interpret, indicating your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream: The color green in a dream is one of the important visions that many people search for because they see it in a dream, but these interpretations change between those who see them, as they differ between a married woman and an unmarried woman, and differ according to dream interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about green, Ibn Shaheen explains Whoever sees the color green in a dream is the one who waters green plants, this indicates that the dreamer will receive a huge amount of money soon. This previous vision may be a sign that the person is dreaming of those dreams in which this person will be able to achieve the various goals and desires that he seeks Achieved. Finally, this vision expresses that this person will be able to obtain a large amount of money and break even without facing any problems at work or stress. Green in a dreamIf one sees in a dream that there is a group of green spaces and green plants in front of the house in which he resides In which the fortuneteller is, it means that this person has the ability to fulfill many of the desires that he desires and seeks to achieve, and it also shows that. The dreamer's life will become better than it is now, in terms of his social and material life, as well as psychologically. But if one sees in his dream the same vision in addition to collecting these crops, this is evidence that the dreamer will face many problems and obstacles in his life and also expresses his inability To get rid of or overcome these problems. Green in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees herself in a place full of green plants and that her work is inside that place, this means that this girl will soon approach a good man who wants to marry her. It also indicates that this person will be the reason for her happiness in her next life. As for an unmarried girl who sees in a dream that the greenery around her is losing its luster and withering, this indicates many problems that this girl will face in the near future, and this vision serves as a warning to pay attention. To the difficulties and problems surrounding her.Green in a dream for a pregnant womanStill not finding an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Since interpreters have interpreted many symbols such as color symbols and different locations, therefore we will find that a place full of green plants is interpreted by jurists as good in most cases, but there are two cases in which we must put many Red lines because their interpretation is negative, and after the dreamer sees them in a dream, he will find a lot of loss and destruction when he wakes up. The first case: The green land is full of light green plants, and it is not yellow, because if they appear yellow in the dream, it will be interpreted as illness. The second case: If the The dreamer dreams that the cultivated land in which he saw himself in a dream is burning until he eats all the fruits on it, then this is interpreted either as social problems or financial losses and perhaps bankruptcy and drought sooner rather than later.

title: I dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dream In case you are worried about some dreams, below we explain what it means.I dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dreamI dreamed that I was expelled from school in a dream. It could be a sign of distress and harassment, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees being expelled from school in a dream, this may lead to crises that he faces, and God knows all that he does not see. If a married man sees being expelled from school in a dream, this may be a sign of some problems with his wife. His family, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees Kurds from school in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of nourishment, and God is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees my mother giving birth to a male child In a dream, this may indicate goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees that he is giving birth to a child in a dream, this may indicate an extension of sustenance, and God knows best everything that no one has seen. If an unmarried girl sees her mother giving birth to a male child, this could be a sign On pride and pride, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, the dream interpretation of a non-pregnant mother giving birth to a male child in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows all that is not seen. I dreamed that I married my uncle in a dream. I dreamed that I married my uncle in a dream, then perhaps seeing the husband is one of Your uncle leads to good or bad. If an unmarried girl sees her uncle getting married, she may express her love for someone who resembles her uncle, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying her uncle in a dream, this may be evidence of a lack of interest in a merciful relationship, and God knows best. title: Dream Interpretation: A thief entered the house and did not steal anything for free

preview.html: Dream interpretation of a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything for freeSome people often want to get an interpretation of a dream they saw in a dream, believing that it is related to their real life, which recently led them to wonder about the interpretation of a dream of a thief who broke into the house and did not. They steal anything for free, married and single, as many explanations and explanations have been provided by his encyclopedia website. Dreaming of a thief entering the house and not stealing anything. Seeing a dream of a thief entering the house and not stealing anything from it is a very common dream, especially since everyone is afraid of being robbed, which can be interpreted far from dream interpretations through psychology in terms of feeling insecure. At home, which may be related to some problems that the dreamer faces, including the dreamer with his family members or because he has committed one of the wrong things that he fears being discovered, so it can be said that the interpretation of a dream about a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything psychologically is a reflection of the person’s internal emotional state. Interpretation of Dreams A thief entered the house and did not steal anything for free. The Muslim scholar Ibn Sirin revealed the interpretation of the dream of a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything individually in his famous book on the interpretation of dreams, where he linked its events to some other evidence that the girl could see. Which led him to different possible interpretations, such as: If the thief is close to her, she will soon enjoy goodness and happiness. If the thief is unknown, it indicates his engagement to a good man. If the thief does not harm her and does not steal anything, this may indicate positive changes in her life. Interpretation of a dream A thief who did not steal anything in the house for a married womanWhile the interpretation of a dream about a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything for an unmarried woman, which Ibn Sirin showed us, has very positive meanings and interpretations, the matter is somewhat different if a married woman sees it, because the interpretation of a dream about a thief came And not stealing anything from the house for a married woman with these different interpretations: If the thief enters the house and does not steal anything and is an old man, then this is evidence that there are evil people in their lives. This dream could indicate that she should be careful because she will be harmed by those close to her. It is possible that The dream of a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything from a married woman will increase her status. Interpretation of seeing a thief who is unable to enter the house in a dream? It should be noted that the meaning of the dream of the thief and his inability to enter the house is also different from what appeared in the interpretation of the dream of the thief who entered the house and did not steal Something for Al-Hur and Ibn Sirin. And Nabulsi, as the meaning of this dream is the presence of a bad person in the family or the work environment in which you work. This is a dream that requires caution in dealing with everything. Despite the importance of knowing the interpretation of the dream of a thief who entered the house and did not steal anything for free, it must be pointed out that dreams can be misleading in some dreams and should not be relied upon. Our daily life because God is supreme and knows our destiny.

title: Interpretation of molar in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a molar in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen, among the dreams that carry many interpretations are dreams related to teeth and molars. About interpretations of dreams, so in this article you will learn together today about the interpretation of a molar in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a molar in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. If one of you sees that his teeth in a dream have become defective, this indicates the dreamer’s feeling of instability and comfort. But if he sees in a dream that his teeth have increased in number, this indicates that a new child is approaching the dreamer. Seeing molars in general, strong, white and in good health, is a sign of strength, happiness and good news. As for molars falling out or being removed, this is These are not praiseworthy visions, and they do not bring good. As for the pain of a molar in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer has harmed someone close to him and who he represents with force and support, whether through actions or words. If one of the molars falls out, this is evidence of the dreamer’s long life, but if all his teeth fall out And his molars, this is a sign of the death of every relative and family before him, and their failure to recover. And God knows best. But if evil falls into the hands of the dreamer, this is a sign of the abundance of money and great survival that will come his way. If the tooth falls into the dreamer’s lap, this indicates that God will grant him many children. If the tooth falls from the fortuneteller to the ground, this is a sign of His death, and God knows best. If all the teeth fall out in the lower jaw, this is evidence of stress, worry, sadness, and worry that will affect the fortuneteller. However, if he picks up the teeth after they fall to the ground, this indicates the death of one of them. they. . A close friend of the dreamer or one of his children. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tooth in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi differs slightly in the interpretation of a tooth in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Whoever has a tooth that falls out and finds it is evidence of the dreamer’s long life, but if it falls out and does not fall out. You find it an indication of a serious illness, death, or affliction that may befall the dreamer, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. As for the lower jaw, if it is a molar or tooth, this means in a dream sadness, anxiety, and misfortunes, and that a great disaster is on the dreamer’s path, and it could also be a harbinger of someone’s death. . Of the children, may God bless them. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a molar in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen agreed with Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi in interpreting time in a dream, but he added to them the following: If the fortuneteller sees that he is replacing the lower jaw instead of the upper jaw, this indicates that women are The life of the fortuneteller is tyrannical and domineering over the fortuneteller and his decisions. However, if the dreamer is found brushing his teeth with floss or with a traitor, this indicates the extreme poverty that accompanies the dreamer and the separation between the family and relatives. It also appears that the dreamer is mocking and gossiping all the time. It is often linked to the psychological and mental factor and daily life situations. It is closely related to the dreams that a person sees during his sleep, especially since it hides many negative or positive feelings that eventually turn into greed and dreams during sleep.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of a virgin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant virgin: Is it good or bad to see a pregnant virgin? What are the negative interpretations of a virgin’s pregnancy in a dream? What does a virgin’s dream of carrying twins symbolize? In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of the Virgin Mary’s pregnancy according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the dream of the pregnant Virgin. Scientists interpreted the vision of the Virgin as evidence of various experiences and the dreamer’s transition to a new stage of her life full of happiness and joy. A large belly in a dream shows a lot of money that will be obtained. The dreamer will soon see the positive development that will happen to her. As for giving birth in the dream, it leads to financial problems and crises or the inability to get a job that suits her diet, and she will enjoy many blessings and gifts in her life. Commentators said that pregnancy with twins in the vision is a sign of improving conditions. Health and psychological well-being soon, but male childbirth in a dream symbolizes disasters and misfortunes, and if the Virgin Mary was pregnant in her dream by a man who proposed to her. Ibn Sirin interpreted a pregnant woman’s vision of the Virgin Mary as a sign that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will bless her in her life and provide her with everything she wants soon. If she gives birth in her dream, this indicates that her marriage contract is close to a good person who has all the good qualities that she desires. Her marriage is approaching and he promises her that it will be as she planned and it will be so. A happy and satisfied day. A large pregnancy belly in a dream means facing a major challenge at work or study, but the dreamer has the ability to overcome it. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The most important Interpretations of a dream about a pregnant virgin. Interpretation of a dream about a virgin girl being pregnant with twins. Scientists interpreted the pregnancy of twins in a dream about the Virgin Mary as evidence that God (the Almighty) will give her a lot of money from where it is not counted and she will get a great benefit from someone who knows her soon, but if the owner is pregnant with twins. Male, this is a sign that he heard the unpleasant news, about a relative soon. It is said that pregnancy with twins, a girl and a boy, is a sign of the dreamer’s accumulation of debts and her inability to pay. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnant woman for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried pregnant woman leads to many The good things that she enjoys and the success that surrounds her on every side, and the dream may indicate that the standard of living will change for the worse soon. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth symbolizes good news and can also mean that the single woman will soon buy a new car or move to another house Where she feels more comfortable than her current home. Interpretation of a dream about touching a pregnant woman’s belly for a single woman. If an unmarried woman touches the belly of a pregnant woman she knows in her dream, this means that she will soon reach her goals and feel proud and self-respect, and if the dreamer sees the fetus

title: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a small snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a small snake: The snake in the dream indicates the presence of deceitful and hypocritical people in the life of the fortuneteller, and the green snake in the girl’s dream indicates her marriage to a good man. Its bite is poisonous and leads to death without the person seeing the part of the bite or determining its location. There are many snakes that contain poisons that are difficult to get rid of or find a treatment for. Therefore, a dream about a snake is one of the most frightening and bad dreams that make the dreamer feel fear and anxiety. The snake indicates Treachery, treachery, and bad friendship, as well as envy, hatred, and many problems, and owning snakes indicates the rule and authority of God. Dreams and what we see in them represent a lot to us and affect the course of daily life and our psychological state. When we see a happy dream, a person becomes in a good mood and a good psychological state. On the contrary, when we see a bad or sad dream, it takes control of our spirits and disturbs the calm of the day.So you see that the science of dream interpretation is a big world and many have specialized in it for a long time. They explain to us some of these dreams and their effects on reality, and it is certain that most interpreters said that dreams are nothing but a reflection of us that the subconscious mind stores throughout the day and retrieves them again in a dream, so here in the article we will explain the interpretation of a dream about a small snake (snake).Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of a small snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a small snake in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing a small snake in a person’s dream means that he is afflicted with a disease. This dream is considered a sign of his recovery from this disease, God willing. Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer who sees snakes in his dream interprets this vision as a warning to him about something and a warning against what he is thinking of the treachery and betrayal of one of his friends, relatives or neighbours. Therefore, the owner of this vision must be careful with those around him and when the dreamer talks about His dream of swallowing a snake shows the great goodness that will come to the dreamer and also indicates his promotion at work. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a small snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabul. Interpretation of seeing a small snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a small snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is evidence of the presence of many enemies. In the dreamer’s life, under God’s protection, and that person is far away from harm and evil. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing a small snake in a person’s dream as evidence of the presence of many bad friends in the dreamer’s life and that evil and wickedness are conspiring against him. Interpretation of seeing a small snake for Nabulsi in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a small snake In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi, Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing a small snake in a person’s dream is evidence of treachery and betrayal by one of the close dreamers, according to the color, shape, and size of the snake, and seeing a snake in the home indicates magic and sorcery. Envy of a relative or friend, and Al-Nabulsi also explained that the dreamer’s ownership of a snake indicates that in order to gain money, prestige and influence, Sheikh Al-Nabulsi and the scholar Ibn Sirin agreed that seeing a snake
